transport:
Transport:

Private car, Walking, Cruise

Flight: 4 FLIGHTS ...

1. Fly from Hanoi to Danang (1 hour 20 minutes)

2. Fly from Danang to Ho Chi Minh City (01 hour 20 minutes)

3. Fly from Ho Chi Minh City to Siem Reap (01 hour)

4. Fly from Siem Reap to Sihanoukville (1 hour 5 minutes)

*This experience is a Free Time Add-on and not included in trip costs
team:
Team: Private Guide, Driver and Trip Managing Experts

A highly trained Trip Manager who brings your adventure to life. An expert driver who knows foreign roads better than Google Maps. Local Guides who make tourist traps a thing of the past. This is your team. Smart, friendly, fun, and integral to everything we do.

*This experience is a Free Time Add-on and not included in trip costs
meal:
Meals: 4 Dinner, 12 Breakfast

Prepare to embark on a passionate pilgrimage on the food front. We can guide your tastebuds however you wish, whether you want to up the skillset with a local cooking class or find out where the locals eat.

*This experience is a Free Time Add-on and not included in trip costs
services:
